column4: So I was thinking... since GIMP is being dropped from Lucid, we need a new simple graphics editing program. Pinta seems to meet all the requirements quite nicely: http://pinta-project.com/
sudobash_ Gimp just isn't in the default install...  you can still install it
ZykoticK9, I mean as somethign included in the default install for new users to play with.
sudobash_ actually currently it's still there (in Alpha 2)
